Today, The South is lighting up with 2 ft @9s SSW swell and fresh 15 mph NW winds. Derrynane and Barley Cove are your best bets, offering clean conditions during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 1 ft @6s, with fresh NNW winds making it poor across the board. The day after continues the trend with similar 1 ft @6s surf and fresh W winds. Best: today.
